text: Rhys Carré (born 8 February 1998) is a Wales international rugby union player who plays for Cardiff Blues as a loosehead prop. Carré made his debut for the Cardiff Blues in 2016 having previously played for the organisation's academy team. He joined Saracens for the 2019-20 seasonCarré joins Saracens before returning to Cardiff Blues the following season. ==International== Carré made his debut for Wales 31 August 2019 in the starting line up for the world cup warm up match versus Ireland.Carré Wales debut He was subsequently selected in Wales 2019 World Cup Squad.Wales 2019 World Cup Squad == References == == External links == *Cardiff Blues profile Category:Rugby union players from Cardiff Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:Wales international rugby union players Category:Cardiff Blues players Category:Saracens F.C. players Category:Living people Category:1998 births
title: Rhys Carré
